attributes.action: End ALL analogue radio transmissions early
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the Prime Minister to put an end to ALL analogue radio in this country as soon as possible. When the "Mk2" D.A.B arrives,everyone will wonder why you did`nt do this sooner! Ten years is far too long to wait. There are dozens of CHEAP dab radios on the market for the home AND the car. Try it. D.A.B is Brilliant!!!
